# hotfun

{hotfun} is a collection of functions used in the Health Outcomes Team (aka HOT) at MSKCC

## Installation

You can install the released version of hotfun from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ddsjoberg/hotfun")
```

and the development version with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ddsjoberg/hotfun", ref = "dev")
```
